full_summary:
# Furniture Provision for Surrey

## Tender Information

* **Title**: Furniture Provision for Surrey
* **Reference Number**: cb-25-10668672
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: CIC-157332
* **Publication Date**: December 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

## Procurement Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
* **End User Entity**: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Service/Supply Description

* The Goods and Services Branch has a requirement for the provision of office furniture to be installed at 9900 King George Boulevard, Surrey, British Columbia by March 31st, 2024.
* The procurement covers a requirement for the following categories:
	+ Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products
	+ Product Category 5 - Ancillary and Lighting Products

## Instructions and Requirements

* Bidders must be registered suppliers under Supply Arrangement (SA) E60PQ-140003/C
* Bids must be submitted in English or French, in the form of a sealed tender
* Bid opening will take place on January 19, 2024 at 14:00:00 at the following address: 
* IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Eve-Marie Leduc
* **Email**: IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (000) 000-0000
* **Fax**: 
* **Address**: 70 Crémazie, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 1L1

Please note that the tender closing date is January 19, 2024 at 14:00:00. To access the tender documents, please visit [available here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27609/notice-of-proposed-procurement-157332.pdf) or [here](https://canadabu
